name: Bar Essentials Everyone Should Have

contents: A well-stocked bar is the backbone of every household, but rarely does everyone have all these essentials. Not you, though. Don't be the person who has people over, offers them something to drink, and then has a missing corkscrew or mismatching wine glasses.

body.name: Essentials
contents: There is no way to not feel like a badass when you're rattling the bejesus out of one of these babies. In fact, let's just say that when this things a'shaking, your guests' knees are a'quaking. Have a drink and maybe that line will make sense. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

An actual Boston shaker is actually just the large metal tin  as the top and a standard 16oz mixing glass as the bottom (instead of the smaller metal tin), which admittedly helps with the sound a little, but whatever, command that attention!
Its genius lies in its simplicity: it's easy to use and easy to clean. It can also act as your strainer if you pinch the sides together.
Get a good quality one that is thick and stainless steel, like this one:
Or if you have a local restaurant supply store, you can pick one up there, too, lending even more credibility to your inner-bartender. üòâ
This might seem insultingly obvious, but it can't be overlooked! If you have an ice maker you're golden. If you don't get some

tagline: Bar staples you have no reason to not have
pageDescription: These are the only essential bar items you need to have a great drink tonight

contents: Bro bros, Wendy's has a new chicken sandwich. And they're giving it away. **For free**. Until **Nov. 8th**. ü§Ø

Wendy's says that their new chicken cutlet is so much better than their previous, which I actually thought was already pretty good, that they're doing away with it in all their other chicken sandwiches (think the Asiago Chicken Ranch Club, the Pretzel Bacon Pub Chicken Sandwich, and the Bacon Jalape√±o Chicken Sandwich) and giving you until the 8th to taste its magnificence for **free**.
2020 just got a little better. It is now at -9,999,999,999,999,999. You go, 2020!

name: Eat a Wendy's Chicken Sandwich...for free!
tagline: Free chicken sandwich. Like, do we really have to say anything else?
pageDescription: Eat the new Wendy's chicken sandwich for free until November 8th 2020!
